readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.Mon: Hello, farmer.#$e#I've been gone so long... I feel like a stranger.
content.MovieInvitation: Erm... okay. Thank you. I'll meet you there.$h
content.Mon4: I don't know if I'll ever get used to being back home.#$e#The peacefulness of the town feels like a mask. That's probably just me though.
content.Tue: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Well, except that you're here.
content.Tue2: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Except that we have a new farmer in town.$h
content.Wed6: ...I lost a lot of friends in battle.$s#$e#What's sad is that I can't even remember their faces.#$e#...
content.Wed: You've been here a while now, haven't you? Your farm must be thriving.
content.Thu6: #$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#Sam has really grown up since I left. He's a man now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for him.$s
content.Thu: Are you friends with my son?#$e#You probably know him better than I do...$s
content.Thu_inlaw_Sam: Hey, @. Are you enjoying the married lifestyle?
content.Fri: It looks like a decent day for fishing, doesn't it?
content.Sat: Jodi tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it.
content.Sat8: I have trouble sleeping, so please excuse me if I seem tired.#$e#I'm sure you can understand.
content.Sun: I don't know what to do with myself now that I'm back.#$e#I'm used to having more structure in my day.
content.event_popcorn1: You keep quiet! Stop trying to turn me against my wife.$u
content.event_popcorn3: Don't lie to me! I hate lies more than anything!$u
